bibl.title: The Pastophorion: 'Priests' Houses' in Legal Texts from Ptolemaic Pathyris and Elsewhere in Egypt.
bibl.note: Locations of pastophoria. - Construction and layout of pastophoria. - Pastophoria in the archaeological record. - Concluding observations. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Siân E. Thomas, The Pastophorion: 'Priests' Houses' in Legal Texts from Ptolemaic Pathyris and Elsewhere in Egypt.
Locations of pastophoria. - Construction and layout of pastophoria. - Pastophoria in the archaeological record. - Concluding observations. - Avec résumé en anglais.
